items.title: Oil’s Problem Isn’t Iran or Russia — It’s Too Much Oil
items.summary: Crude oil prices are in retreat after rising on the possibility of U.S. strikes on Iran. Before the retreat, however, Brent crude and WTI had jumped to the highest in months, countering bearish forecasts for the year—and tearing traders between geopo

items.title: Cuba’s Energy Crisis Will Worsen Without Venezuelan Oil

items.title: Inside Brazil’s Race to Secure Gas Supply

items.title: Trump Keeps Oil Traders Guessing on Iran
